front.title: On Using 'Symbiotic Relationship' to Repel Network Flooding Attack

abstract.t: This memo describes a simple defense mechanism against a specifictype of network flooding attacks. The suggested mechanism requires amobile node to establish a 'symbiotic relationship' with theinfrastructure, in order to empower it to repel such attack whilegiving enough insurance to the source(s) of the traffic about theneed to cease sending traffic to the targeted network.
